Package it.polimi.ingswPSP35.client

Interface UInterface

public interface UInterface
Allows interface between user and game

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void choose2Divinities​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> availableDivinities)
    Asks the first player to choose 2 divinities in a 2 players match
    void choose3Divinities​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> availableDivinities)
    Asks the first player to choose 3 divinities in a 3 players match
    void chooseColour​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> availableColors)
    Asks the player to choose a colour to use for the next game
    void chooseFirstPlayer​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> players)
    Asks the player to choose the first player among the ones provided
    void chosenColors​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> chosenColors)
    Notifies the player about every chosen color
    void displayNotification​(java.lang.String notification)
    It displays all the notifications during the game to the players
    java.lang.String getConnectionInfo()
    Asks the player for the ip address.
    void getNPlayers()
    Asks the first player to choose the number of players for the next game
    java.lang.String getPlayerInfo()
    Asks the player for the username
    void performAction()
    Manages a player's turn
    void pickDivinity​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> divinitiesList)
    Asks the player to choose a divinity for the next game
    void placeWorker()
    Asks the player to place the workers at the beginning of the game
    void setMatchInfo​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> userToDivinity)
    stores all the current match parameters
    void startMatch()
    at the end of the configuration phase, it starts the match
    void turnEnded()
    Notifies the player that his turn is ended
    void updateBoard​(java.util.List<it.polimi.ingswPSP35.commons.ReducedSquare> changedSquares)
    Updates the board during the game

      Parameters:
      userToDivinity - list of every player and their respective divinity
